responsibilities: AWS Infrastructure Management: You will be responsible for managing and optimizing our AWS cloud infrastructure. Your responsibilities will include configuration, maintenance, and ensuring the security and stability of our Linux environment., Collaboration and Continuous Improvement: You will work closely with other engineers to ensure a smooth, continuous deployment pipeline. Your role will involve regular collaboration to review existing systems and processes, proposing and implementing improvements to enhance performance and reliability., Incident Management: You will play a key role in incident management, including problem diagnosis, swift resolution, and post-mortem analysis. This includes creating and updating system documentation, process guidelines, and other relevant materials., Contribute to a Culture of Excellence: Finally, as a member of the edrone team, you will be expected to contribute to our culture of operational excellence, innovation, and continuous learning. Your ideas and contributions will be valued as we work together to drive the success of our eCommerce solutions.
